Articles.Content: Hi, just suggest to add a new type of vessel when you rename it: A Spaceplane, for SSTO and so...
Most of my SSTO are not spaceplanes,  just saying...

They need to just add customizable categories and user-selected (and editable) icons, because a lot of people are going to have different ideas about what the categories should be.

Edited June 5, 2017 by razark

44 minutes ago, razark said:

They need to just add customizable categories and user-selected (and editable) icons, because a lot of people are going to have different ideas about what the categories should be.

IDK, I think dev's effort is better employed in something else. After all, if you're looking at the map view and see a plane icon in orbit somewhere, it's a spaceplane. You can adapt most designs to the stock categories, and it's not like the stock game has a proper gui in where to manage multiple flights anyway - icons should be accessory to that
We already got "plane". A spaceplane is a plane. I dont think we need a new catagory for the same thing, just with "space" glued behind it.

22 hours ago, NSEP said:

We already got "plane". A spaceplane is a plane. I dont think we need a new catagory for the same thing, just with "space" glued behind it. 

I endorse this space-statement.
We dont need a spaceplane category any more than we need a space rocket/capsule category. (Or non-space/ suborbital, if you prefer)
